channel.title: Improve 1% everyday | Veri Ferdiansyah
channel.description: My personal blog, where I share my learnings about software engineering

item.title: Building an API with NestJS #1: Initial Setup
item.description: In this first part of "Building an API with NestJS" series, we will learn on how to bootstrap our base project to create our API.
item.author: veri.ferdi@gmail.com (Veri Ferdiansyah)

item.title: Building an API with NestJS #2: Setup Husky and CommitLint
item.description: In this second part of "Building an API with NestJS" series, we will learn how to integrate husky and commitlint to our project.
item.author: veri.ferdi@gmail.com (Veri Ferdiansyah)

item.title: Set up ESLint and Prettier for Your JavaScript Project
item.description: A good developer experience will help you produce better code and ship better product. ESLint and Prettier will help you with that.
item.author: veri.ferdi@gmail.com (Veri Ferdiansyah)

item.title: TypeScript 101: A Comprehensive Guide
item.description: Discover how TypeScript empowers software engineers with static typing, enhanced tooling, and seamless JavaScript compatibility for building scalable and maintainable applications.
item.author: veri.ferdi@gmail.com (Veri Ferdiansyah)

item.title: Using Custom Domain in Vercel
item.description: Do you know you can use custom domain in Vercel? Let me tell you how.
item.author: veri.ferdi@gmail.com (Veri Ferdiansyah)
